mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_number, id, product_number, product_count) values(cart_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{product_number}, #{product_count})
mapper.select: select * from (select c.cart_number, c.id, c.product_number, c.product_count, p.product_name, p.product_color, p.product_price, i.stored_thumbnail from product p, product_img i, cart c where p.product_number = i.product_number and p.product_number = c.product_number) where id = #{id}
